text: (visvasavantayini! obata bharyayavan kihipa deneku sitiyahot) oba (obage) bharyayavan atare (sampurna vasayenma) sadharana lesa katayutu kala yutuya yayi (kopamana durata) kæmati vuvada, (eya) obata prayogika vanne næta. namut (ekama bhayya_yava desata) oba sampurnayenma sendu vi an ayava (ataramam kara), e me ata pæddennan bavata pat nokaranu! oba (allahta) biya vi (oba atare) sadharanava hæsirunahot niyata vasayenma allah (obage væradi valata) samava di dayava pahala karanneku vasayen sitinneya
